data.name: HOSTLIGHT Demo
data.detailed_description:
Hostlight is a first-person puzzle game with mechanics that revolve around the use of LIGHT AND SHADOW, and the creation of objects that help to solve the puzzles throughout the game.

GAME CHARACTERISTICS


• Create the pieces required to solve the puzzles through the use of projected shadows.

[/img] • The lights and shadows are projected by manipulating silhouettes that hit the player or that are created. [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1897390/extras/ascensor_1.gif?t=1655805093[/img] • It will be played with primary light colours (Red, Green and Blue). Only the white light creates objects. [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1897390/extras/theguide_1.gif?t=1655805093[/img] • Use of mirrors to direct light beams and use of rails. [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com

• Lights and shadows can be projected to obtain the necessary pieces.



• The lights and shadows are projected by manipulating silhouettes that hit the player or that are
created.



• It will be played with primary light colours (Red, Green and Blue). Only the white light creates
objects.



• Use of mirrors to direct light beams and use of rails.



• To pass from one level to another you need to light up the platform in the middle of each room.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6400 | AMD ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1050ti | AMD RX 570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 6600 | AMD 5 3600
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia rtx 2060 | AMD RX 5600XT
